title.native: 神は遊戯に飢えている。

description:
In a world of idle gods, humans are forced into brain challenges with them. With three defeats, gods lose their right to challenge, while 10 victories spell human triumph. Fay, determined to achieve the impossible, enters the ultimate test of wits against the gods. Will he defy divinity or is he just another loss in the making?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Gods' Game We Play The Animation
เกมอัจฉริยะ คนปะทะเทพ

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Board Game
tags.description: Centers around characters playing board games.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/xexex36) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoshihiro_watanabe1971/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/渡邊義弘_(アニメーター%29)

An animator, character designer and adult game artist.

_Not to be confused with the producer [of the same name.](https://anilist.co/staff/233840)_

[Website](http://www.alialive.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/alia___official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/alia___official/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/alia20180723/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AliAofficial/videos)

__Formed:__ 2018 

__Introduction:__
AliA is a Japanese six-piece rock band, who debuted on July, 2018 with their mini album _AliVe_.

__Members:__
- [AYAME](https://anilist.co/staff/326046) – vocalist
- RINA – violinist
- SEIYA – bassist
- [TKT](https://anilist.co/staff/209375/TKT) – keyboardist, lyricist
- [Eren Okamura](https://anilist.co/staff/209376/Eren-Okamura) (岡村エレン), better known as EREN (エレン) – guitarist, lyricist and composer
- BOB – drummer

__[Profile (Barnstorm Design Labo)](http://barnstorm-design-labo.com/member/yuri.html)__

__Satoshi Yuri__ is a Japanese former mangaka, illustrator, character designer and background artist.
In-betweener turned CG artist. Formerly affiliated with [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).
